img_summary: The image depicts a scene from a video game set in a snowy landscape with rocky cliffs and trees. A character dressed in red is engaged in combat, surrounded by glowing sparks. The character's health bar is visible above their head, indicating they are in a battle. On the right side of the screen, there is a display showing "+9" and "Will x48," suggesting the collection of resources or points. Various icons are visible in the bottom left and right corners, likely representing abilities or items available to the player.
